TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit XPathQueryGenerator extends System.Object
public ref class XPathQueryGenerator abstract sealed

summary.span: When given a class representing a data contract, and metadata representing a member of the contract, produces an XPath query for the member.

span.span: When given a class representing a data contract, and metadata representing a member of the contract, produces an XPath query for the member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需資料合約的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用資料合約](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-data-contracts.md)。For more information about data contracts, see [Using Data Contracts](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-data-contracts.md). 使用類別有四個步驟：To use the class, there are four steps: 1. 視需要，將 和 套用至型別及其欄位或屬性，以建立資料合約型別。Create the data contract type by applying the and as appropriate to the type and its fields or properties. 2. 使用 類別的 方法產生 MemberInfo 陣列。Use the method of the class to generate the MemberInfo array. 3. 將型別及陣列貼至方法。Pass the type and the array to the method. 4. 如有需要，請使用 參數所傳回的 `namespaces` 檢查 XPath 查詢中的命名空間前置詞參考的 XML 命名空間。If needed, use the returned by the `namespaces` parameter to examine the XML namespaces referenced by the namespaces prefixes in the XPath query. > [!NOTE] > XPath 中預設會使用命名空間前置詞 "xg" (表示「XPath 產生器」)。The namespace prefix "xg" (for "XPath Generator") is used as the default in the XPath. 這項設定無法變更。This cannot be changed. 請改為參考 NameTable 集合，查看與該前置詞關聯的命名空間。Instead, refer to the NameTable collection to see what namespace the prefix is associated with. ## Examples 下列範例會從兩個類別建立 XPath 查詢，這兩個類別均已套用 和 屬性。The following example creates XPath queries from two classes to which the and attributes have been applied. [!code-csharp[XPathQueryGenerator#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/xpathquerygenerator/cs/source.cs#0)] [!code-vb[XPathQueryGenerator#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/xpathquerygenerator/vb/source.vb#0)]

summary.span: Creates an XPath from a data contract.

span.span: Creates an XPath from a data contract.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string CreateFromDataContractSerializer (Type type, System.Reflection.MemberInfo[] pathToMember, out System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager namespaces);

.method public static hidebysig string CreateFromDataContractSerializer(class System.Type type, class System.Reflection.MemberInfo[] pathToMember, [out] class System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager& namespaces) cil managed

public: static System::String ^ CreateFromDataContractSerializer(Type ^ type, cli::array <System::Reflection::MemberInfo ^> ^ pathToMember, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Xml::XmlNamespaceManager ^ % namespaces);
static member CreateFromDataContractSerializer : Type * System.Reflection.MemberInfo[] * -> string

param.name: type
param.span: The type that represents a data contract.

span.span: The type that represents a data contract.

param.name: pathToMember
param.span: The metadata, generated using the method of the class, that points to the specific data member used to generate the query.

span.span: The metadata, generated using the method of the class, that points to the specific data member used to generate the query.

param.name: namespaces
param.span: The XML namespaces and their prefixes found in the data contract.

span.span: The XML namespaces and their prefixes found in the data contract.

summary.span: Creates an XPath from a data contract using the specified data contract type, array of metadata elements, and namespaces..

span.span: Creates an XPath from a data contract using the specified data contract type, array of metadata elements, and namespaces..

returns.span: The XPath generated from the type and member data.

span.span: The XPath generated from the type and member data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需資料合約的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用資料合約](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-data-contracts.md)。For more information about data contracts, see [Using Data Contracts](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-data-contracts.md). ## Examples 下列範例會從兩個類別建立 XPath 查詢，這兩個類別均已套用 和 屬性。The following example creates XPath queries from two classes to which the and attributes have been applied. summary.span: Creates an XPath from a data contract using the specified contract data type, array of metadata elements, the top level element, and namespaces.
